_3dptvy8rgqias7p7.name: Price
_3dptvy8rgqias7p7.script:
var ohlc = options.useHeikinAshi ? 
    avg_heikinashi(bar) : 
    options.useGaps ? 
    avg_ohlc_with_gaps(bar) : 
    avg_ohlc(bar)

plotcandlestick(ohlc)

_0iin7r85ecqhrxaw.name: CVD SPOT
_0iin7r85ecqhrxaw.script:
buyVol = source(vbuy, type=spot)
sellVol = source(vsell, type=spot)
line(cum(buyVol - sellVol), title=SPOT)

_gk4fs0c449xkogk1.name: CVD PERP
_gk4fs0c449xkogk1.script:
buyVol = source(vbuy, type=perp)
sellVol = source(vsell, type=perp)
line(cum(buyVol - sellVol), title=PERP)

_9310elccu16icmxd.name: EMA
_9310elccu16icmxd.script:
line(ema($price.close, options.fastLength), color=options.fastColor)
line(ema($price.close, options.mediumLength), color=options.mediumColor)
line(ema($price.close, options.slowLength), color=options.slowColor)

_jsdwbvw1t8wf79tu.name: Perp

_4278l0sxiiqw8e39.name: PVSRA
_4278l0sxiiqw8e39.script:
high = $price.high
low = $price.low
close = $price.close
open = $price.open
volume = (vbuy+vsell)/close

averageVolume = sum(volume[1], 10)/10.0
volumeSpread = volume*(high - low)
highestVolumeSpread = highest(volumeSpread[1], 10)
color = 
  (
    (volume >= 2*averageVolume || volumeSpread >= highestVolumeSpread) ? 
      (close > open ? options.greenVectorColor : options.redVectorColor) : 
    (volume >= 1.5*averageVolume) ? 
      (close > open ? options.blueVectorColor : options.violetVectorColor) : 
    (close > open ? options.regularCandleUpColor : options.regularCandleDownColor)
  )

if (options.showDelta) {
  plothistogram({ time: time, value: Math.abs((vbuy-vsell)/close), color: (vbuy-vsell)/close > 0 ? options.upColor : options.downColor})
}

plothistogram({
  time: time,
  value: volume < 0 ? Math.abs(volume) : volume,
  color: color
})

$price.color = color
